name: Robowork
description:
A High Quality Robotic Survival Game.

You sent by Space-T Company for research newly discovered planet.But you had an accident and your equipments was lost.
Collect Items.Digging mine and melt and Craft.Try to go back to the World.
But can you survive on this planet?
Can you collect items around without any clues?
You will spend energy while walking and running. So will you be able to use this energy correctly?
Improve yourself and try to return to Earth.

Join Discord

Craft Machines

Explore World

Upgrade Yourself
